old_map_puzzle.completed: Well Done! You found a piece of my plan hidden behind the differences in the maps
old_map_puzzle.hint1: This picture looks slightly  different to the one hanging in the 17th century room
old_map_puzzle.hint2: There are 5 differences, these are: compass is the wrong colour, boat to left of compass is missing, blue and white flag on land should be english flag, top left river is missing, boat in top right shouldnt be there

spinning_wheel_puzzle.completed: Well Done! Stopping the wheel on the year this spinning wheel was made opened a secret compartment containing a piece of my plan
spinning_wheel_puzzle.hint1: The wheel looks like it can be stopped on different numbers, could it have anything to do with the wheel in the Lee Room
spinning_wheel_puzzle.hint2: Stopping the wheel on the century (18th) the wheel in the Lee Room was made should give you a piece of the plan

quilt_puzzle.completed: Well Done! Putting the quilt back together made a piece of my plan drop out of it
quilt_puzzle.hint1: The quilt looks like a mixed up version of one hung in the Textiles Room
quilt_puzzle.hint2: Re-arranging the quilt to look like the one in the Textiles room should give you a piece of the plan

portrait_puzzle.completed: Well Done! There was a piece of my plan hidden behind the picture
portrait_puzzle.hint1: I wonder who the portrait is off, its found in the Deer Park Parlor
portrait_puzzle.hint2: Typing in the name of the man this picture is thought to be a picture off should give you another puzzle, The man is thought to be Daniel Coker
portrait_puzzle.hint3: The background this map is on looks interesting
portrait_puzzle.hint4: Clicking on the state which the Stenciled Bredroom is set up from should give you a piece of the plan, This state is Connecticut

shaker_puzzle.completed: Well Done! Hanging up all the Shaker's stuff seemed to make a piece of my plan drop out of the coat
shaker_puzzle.hint1: The peg rack and items look like those in the Shaker Sister's Workroom
shaker_puzzle.hint2: Hanging the items on the pegs in the order they are in the Shaker Sister's Workroom should give you a piece of the plan. This order is Candle, Sock, Coat, board, Chair

harp_puzzle.completed: Well Done! Playing the strings in the right order made a secret compartment open which contained a piece of my plan
harp_puzzle.hint1: The symbols on the side of the harp should refer to objects in the Greek Revival Room
harp_puzzle.hint2: Counting the objects for each symbol gives you the string to play, this should be: Flowers (5), Piano (1), Piano (1), Globe (2), Musical instuments (4), Flowers (5)
